downloadTitle: NSS Labs 2018 Web Browser Security Comparative Reports
downloadDescription: NSS Labs conducted independent global tests measuring how effective browsers are at protecting against socially engineered malware (SEM) and phishing attacks.

detailsSection:
Focused exclusively on IT security, NSS Labs is known globally as a leading security product testing laboratory, offering in-depth security product test reports, continuous security validation, research, and analyst services. NSS Labs conducted two global tests measuring how effective browsers are at protecting against socially engineered malware (SEM) and phishing attacks. The tests were conducted free of charge and NSS Labs did not receive any compensation for browser participation.

Browsers tested Included:
  • Google Chrome: Version 69.0.3497
  • Microsoft Edge 42.17134.1.0
  • Mozilla Firefox: Version 61
Learn more about NSS Labs and this report at https://research.nsslabs.com/reports#cat0=22.
